H0.text: What colour are the berries of the mistletoe plant. Red

H1.text: What colour are the berries of the mistletoe plant. Purple

H2.text: What colour are the berries of the mistletoe plant. Green

H3.text: What colour are the berries of the mistletoe plant. White

A4.text: European mistletoe has ... waxy, white berries that it bears in clusters of two to six.

A5.text: A related species with red fruits, rather than white, Viscum cruciatum, occurs in Southwest Spain and Southern Portugal, as well as in Morocco in North Africa and in southern Africa.

A6.text: The fruit is a white or yellow berry, and except for very rarely, containing one seed embedded in the very sticky, glutinous fruit pulp.
